Title: Eris Quod Sum
Plot: Trapped, Nathan and Tracy must fight to save their lives against Suresh, who has changed dramatically. Elle returns with shocking news for Claire and her family. Meanwhile, Angela tries to convince Sylar to save Peter; Daphne is ordered to kill Matt or she will be killed herself; and Hiro questions Usutu's advice.
GuestStars: Alan Blumenfeld, Ashley Crow, Blake Shields, Brea Grant, Jamie Hector, Ntare Mwine, Robert Forster, Kristen Bell
